channel.title: Scatter chart examples on chartexample.com
channel.description: Recent content in Scatter chart examples on chartexample.com

item.title: Scatter chart D3 example
item.description: function makeScatter() { // max data item value const max = 100 // min data item value const min = 0 // generating dataset const data = new Array(100).fill().map(() => ({ x: (Math.random() * max) | 0, y: (Math.random() * max) | 0 })) // setting values for margins of svg content const margin = {top: 10, left: 50, right: 10, bottom: 50} // selecting svg container const svg = d3.
